fullplot: In the midst of a nasty public breakup of married movie stars, a studio publicist scrambles to put a cap on the escalating situation as the couple's latest film has found its only print kidnapped by the director.
plot: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.
title: America's Sweethearts

tomatoes.consensus: Despite its famous cast, the movie lacks sympathetic characters and is only funny in spurts.
